markdownRemark.html: Situated an hour's drive from Sevilla and right next to the Atlantic Coast, this golf course has narrow fairways bordered by Mediterranean pine trees. The distances between the greens and tees are short, which makes for a relatively easy game.

frontmatter.title: Club De Golf Bellavista
frontmatter.description: Club De Golf Bellavista - Situated an hour's drive from Sevilla and right next to the Atlantic Coast, this golf course has narrow fairways bordered by Mediterranean pine trees. The distances between the greens and tees are short, which makes for a relatively easy game.
frontmatter.address: Ctra. Huelva-Aljaraque, Km 6, 21110 Aljaraque, Huelva, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 65.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 65.00 euros
